body: It's sad that this is the only "decent" Sailor Mercury doujin out there. The rest are nothing but old doujins involving rape and other stuff.

I have..... conflicted feelings about this.     On one hand, it starts out lovey dovey, but then there's a monster..... but the monster is defeated before it can actually rape her, and it gets lovey dovey again....
Wait, a Sailor Scout actually managed to defeat an enemy... without being raped?! Not on my christian minecraft server!
dammit... why a monster? Amy is like one of my favorite characters of all anime and you just had to make her fuck a monster -_- you are evil
This is actually relaxing after seeing that other manga(where it shall not be named )where it has "nose fuck" and "eye cum"
Booooooooooooo. Lovey dovey was ruined! (I should have read the tags)
